description.@en: You will receive a foretelling of the immediate future, unraveling its mysteries only in the moment before it happens.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you gain one temporary Fate Point to be used as you desire. Once this Fate Point is used, you suffer 6 Corruption as you’ve stolen what death was meant to take away. Once the Duration of the spell expires, the Fate Point goes away, regardless of whether it was used or not.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you don’t suffer Corruption once the spell expires.

criticalFailure.@en: You receive nothing. There is nothing to be learned here. However, at an appointed time in the future by the GM, you will be ridden with a seizure and collapse, convulsing on the ground. You will be left Helpless for a total of six minutes, you cannot recast this Magick until the Duration of the spell has expired and finally, you suffer 6 Corruption.
